Text: thank you so much your great!! have a good weekend

Thanks for this one, the show was better back then i think.
OMG, i loved Heather Tom as Victoria, she was gorgeous!

Thanks again, MsF.

That episode didn't air in Australia. 

What happened was that the network which had Y&R was about 3 or 4 years behind. Then, sometime in the early 2000s or maybe late nineties, they ran a series of "catch up" compilation episodes. 

Even then that didn't make them current. 

So, this ep was one we've never seen, nor have we seen one with that intro.

Thanks again.
Thank you once again from Australia.  You are so good to do this for us.

Is there an episode for Friday or was this one it?

Thanks
No, that was it...! The Friday after Thanksgiving there is always a classic episode..
Thanks Ms. F. I looked it up. It was "pre-empted" by a football game or something...
